item.title: Amazing Breakfasts with Cody!
item.description: Often I get to enjoy wonderful mornings with my girlfriend Cody. She is a great cook, and one of her best concoctions are these AMAZING breakfast burritos: Sorry for the bad picture, I took it with the webcam on my eeepc. I don’t apologize for her cleavage. I did that intentionally without her knowing :)
